content.html: Sure. You are free to die of preventable diseases. You are also free to not get a drivers licence and thus never drive a car. You may refuse background checks and thereby abstain from owning a gun. Quite simple.
content.value: Sure. You are free to die of preventable diseases. You are also free to not get a drivers licence and thus never drive a car. You may refuse background checks and thereby abstain from owning a gun. Quite simple.
